text: @SecPompeo @realDonaldTrump Please explain WHY this bold action has not resulted in TESTING for covid-19 in the US and WHY so many other countries are doing a way better job of testing people. Trump let this spread in the US when he could have stopped it in February. https://t.co/UZKdUGcqyA
